body:
Select  sc.name As SqlObjectsD, T.FieldName ObjectsD
From    sys.columns sc
        Inner Join sys.objects so On
                   so.object_id = sc.object_id
        Inner Join sys.types st On
                   sc.user_type_id = st.user_type_id
        Full Outer Join dbo.PV100_ObjectsD T On
                        T.ITObjectName = so.name And   T.FieldName = sc.name
Where   so.name = 'Pv_Rn_Inventory_Bills' And   st.user_type_id < 257 And   st.is_user_defined = 0

Select  sc.name As SqlObjectsD, T.FieldName ObjectsD
From    dbo.PV100_ObjectsD T
        Inner Join sys.objects so On
                   T.ITObjectName = so.name
        Full Outer Join sys.columns sc On
                        so.object_id = sc.object_id And T.FieldName = sc.name
        Inner Join sys.types st On
                   sc.user_type_id = st.user_type_id
Where   so.name = 'Sv_Rn_Inventory_ShipmentPlanItems' And   st.user_type_id < 257 And   st.is_user_defined = 0
